sn7.13:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava vatehabadhiko hoti;
sn7.13:1.3: ayasma ca upavano bhagavato upatthako hoti.
sn7.13:1.4: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam upavanam amantesi:
sn7.13:1.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma upavano bhagavato patissutva nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena devahitassa brahmanassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva tunhibhuto ekamantam atthasi.
sn7.13:1.7: Addasa kho devahito brahmano ayasmantam upavanam tunhibhutam ekamantam thitam.
sn7.13:5.1: Atha kho devahito brahmano unhodakassa kajam purisena gahapetva phanitassa ca putam ayasmato upavanassa padasi.
sn7.13:5.2: Atha kho ayasma upavano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam unhodakena nhapetva unhodakena phanitam aloletva bhagavato padasi.
sn7.13:6.1: Atha kho devahito brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn7.13:6.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi.
sn7.13:6.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho devahito brahmano bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn7.13:10.1: Evam vutte, devahito brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.13:10.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
